com.cloudera.oryx.api.serving

Interface ServingModelManager<U>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of update message read/written
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ALSServingModelManager, ExampleServingModelManager, KMeansServingModelManager, RDFServingModelManager, ScalaServingModelManagerAdapter

    public interface ServingModelManager<U>
extends Closeable
    Implementations of this interface maintain, in memory, the current state of a model in the serving layer. It is given a reference to a stream of updates during initialization, and consumes models and updates from it, and updates in-memory state accordingly.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      void consume(Iterator<KeyMessage<String,U>> updateIterator)
      Called by the framework to initiate a continuous process of reading models, and reading from the input topic and updating model state in memory, and issuing updates to the update topic.
      Object getModel() 

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        void consume(Iterator<KeyMessage<String,U>> updateIterator)
             throws IOException
        Called by the framework to initiate a continuous process of reading models, and reading from the input topic and updating model state in memory, and issuing updates to the update topic. This will be executed asynchronously and may block.
        Parameters:
        updateIterator - iterator to read models from
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while reading updates

      • getModel

        Object getModel()

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
